definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列线图的制作为估算瘦肉量提供了更简便的方法。

sentences.english: A kind of method for finding matrix image more easily appears in literature.
sentences.chinese: 在一些文献中出现了求解正交表矩阵象的简便方法。

sentences.english: And the glass cannula was more suitable than adhesive bandages for enswathement .
sentences.chinese: 玻璃套管法包扎的效果较创可贴法为好且更为简便。

sentences.english: Aim To find a convenient method to detect cysticercus-antigen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨简便的检测囊虫抗原的方法。

sentences.english: PLC control, human-computer touch-screen, practical function and easy operation.
sentences.chinese: PLC控制，人机画面触摸屏，功能实用，操作简便。

sentences.english: A salad and soup makes a nice light lunch.
sentences.chinese: 一份沙拉和汤就是很好的简便午餐。

sentences.english: The basic training methods of Meihuaquan are simple and strong yet relaxed and highly adaptable.
sentences.chinese: 梅花拳的训练过程简便严格，又随意自然。

sentences.english: A simple and convenient ABS-based tire pressure measure apparatus is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于ABS的轮胎气压简便测量装置。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method is simple, accurate, sensitive, and can be used to identify Jinniukou and similar species.
sentences.chinese: 结论本法简便准确灵敏，可用于鉴别金钮扣及类同品。

sentences.english: For the sake of simplicity, I just return the error message if the call fails.
sentences.chinese: 为简便起见，调用失败时仅返回错误消息。

sentences.english: Conclusions A simple and useful method for DNA extraction from lily'squama leaves are created.
sentences.chinese: 结论该方法提取百合鳞叶总DNA简便实用。

sentences.english: Specially designed computer-controlled system, facillitating the operation.
sentences.chinese: 采用独创的微电脑控制系统，操作简便。

sentences.english: We have constructed suitable screening method for low-temperature sensitive promoters.
sentences.chinese: 建立了简便的双层平板诱导法对启动子进行初筛。

sentences.english: Learn the fastest and simplest way to remove the core.
sentences.chinese: 那就学一下快速简便的去核方法吧。

sentences.english: The method is characterized by its simplicity and rapidity.
sentences.chinese: 方法简便，快速，能在二十分钟内完成双样测定。

sentences.english: Increase your close-ratio by using this handy link.
sentences.chinese: 这个简便链接可以提高您的成交率。

definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
variant of 煩冗|烦冗[fan2 rong3]
course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
